full_text:
COMPLIANCE WITH TRAFFIC CONTROL MANUAL.
	(Added by Ord. No. 142,123, Eff. 7/31/71.)

	All work involving City property or rights of way shall be performed in accordance with the provisions of the latest edition of the manual entitled “Work Area Traffic Control” adopted by the Board.

2.catch_line: Abatement Of Erosion Or Flood Hazard.

4.catch_line: Surcharge For Development Of Automated Systems For The Department Of City Planning.

8.catch_line: Authority To Assign Inspectors For Overtime Work.

9.catch_line: Authority To Inspect And Enforce Stormwater Pollution Control Measures For Construction Activities.

16.catch_line:
Summary Of Fees For The Bureau Of
Engineering.

plain_text:
LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE

COMPLIANCE WITH TRAFFIC CONTROL MANUAL. (§ 61.06)

  COMPLIANCE WITH TRAFFIC CONTROL MANUAL.
	(Added by Ord. No. 142,123, Eff. 7/31/71.)	All work involving City property or
rights of way shall be performed in accordance with the provisions of the latest
edition of the manual entitled “Work Area Traffic Control” adopted by the
Board.
